name: Sobo Tank Cleaner
description: Sobo Tank Cleaner is a highly concentrated powerful and biodegradable heavy duty solvent degreaser, Sobo Tank Cleaner penetrates and lifts the heaviest of oil contamination with reduced risks for the environment. New Sobo Tank Cleaner is a rapid and effective cleaner for use against waxy and residual hydrocarbons on storage tanks walls and floors. Also effective against asphaltine, crude oils, tars, hardened greases and heavy soils.
